parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full pathname of the model for which to get the version history

title: ISldWorks.IGetVersionHistoryCount
description: Gets the size of the array required to hold data returned by ISldWorks::IVersionHistory.

parameters.name: FileName
parameters.description: Full pathname of the model for which to get the version history

returns: Size of array required for ISldWorks::IVersionHistory
remarks:
If the file is not found or an error occurs, then this method returns 0.
To get the version history of a document that is currently open, use
IModelDoc2::VersionHistory
or
IModelDoc2::IVersionHistory
.
